intro_1.speaker: momonga
intro_1.text: Ah, it seems we have a visitor. Welcome to Nazarick, {mc.name}.

intro_2.speaker: momonga
intro_2.text: I am {characters.momonga.title}, the Supreme Being of {characters.momonga.name}. And you are?

intro_3.speaker: albedo
intro_3.text: {mc.name}, you are in the Great Tomb of Nazarick, the most magnificent guild base in all of YGGDRASIL.

intro_4.speaker: momonga
intro_4.text: This is Nazarick, our guild base in the online game YGGDRASIL. But something strange has happened...

intro_5.speaker: albedo
intro_5.text: YGGDRASIL was an online game that shut down 200 years ago. But we've somehow remained conscious in this world.

intro_6.speaker: momonga
intro_6.text: Indeed, it seems impossible. But we must find out what happened. Shall we discuss this further?

choices.text: Yes, I'd like to know more.
This is too much to take in right now.
